tagline: ProHex Open Firmware for the HexBright FLEX LED Flashlight
body:
# Welcome to ProHex!

We're currently building the site. In the meantime, if you'd like to donate, please do so through
[PayPal](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=F6WLAWWK6MCPJ).
name: Prohex
